abilities.title: Anakin Skywalker was weak
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, if this Unit does not have , refresh . After this effect is resolved, this Unit removes and one condition from itself and one character in this Unit may . Then you will die braver than most Choose a character in this Unit and an enemy character within 3 of that character. Pull the chosen enemy character 2 Toward the chosen allied character. Then the chosen enemy character gains [exposed]. The power within will soon serve the Emperor At the end of this Unit's activation, it may use this ability. This Unit gains . Then choose a character in this Unit and an Active objective within 3 of that character. The chosen character contests the chosen objective until the end of this Turn. More machine now than man Characters in this Unit have Protection , Steadfast , and Impact [1] .
